channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM

item.title: Report X-2024050742
item.description:
Report X-2024050742

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-21T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-26
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Daniel Vallejos, 120 Operations Supervisor, advised Safety of a UN1133 Adhesives spill on the trailer floor. Daniel stated while unloading the trailer the spill was noticed. Daniel stated a pallet was stacked on top of the adhesives believing it crushed one the of the boxes in-transit creating the s pill. Cameron with Cura was contacted at 9:20 P.M.
